column4: not exactly. I am trying to install an older version of ubuntu (10.10) so i downloaded the file and wrote the .iso to a cd. i booted into the cd and all that happens is that i boot into my current version of ubuntu (11.10)

hi, I am trying to install an older version of ubuntu (10.10) so i downloaded the file and wrote the .iso to a cd. i booted into the cd and all that happens is that i boot into my current version of ubuntu (11.10)
1: Why are you trying to install an older version of Ubuntu 2: Are you sure that your BIOS booted from the CD?
